subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: With the Ducks down by 3 points but driving late in the game, Spartans defensive end Lawrence Thomas and linebacker Chris Frey sacked Oregon quarterback Vernon Adams Jr. to win it.
snippet: With the Ducks down by 3 points but driving late in the game, Spartans defensive end Lawrence Thomas and linebacker Chris Frey sacked Oregon quarterback Vernon Adams Jr. to win it.
